pr_title: [BEAM-9541] Use a single source of truth for latest Flink version in Gradle tasks.

timeline.message: [BEAM-9541] All Gradle tasks use latest Flink version.
[BEAM-9541] All Gradle tasks use latest Flink version.

Disable Flink classloader leak check when using local execution mode.

Otherwise the check will throw an error when the expansion service is called after the local cluster runs a job.

timeline.bodyText: Just for pure curiosity, why is this needed?
timeline.author: iemejia

replies.bodyText: I believe this is because of GRPC which may attempt to load classes after the Flink job has been removed. Loading new classes on closed classloaders will error without this setting.
replies.author: mxm

replies.bodyText: In any case, we should add a note or JIRA ticket to why this is necessary.
replies.author: mxm
